title: The performance of large language models in intercollegiate Membership of the Royal College of Surgeons examination

authors.name: Chan, J.
affiliations: NIHR Bristol Cardiovascular Biomedical Research Unit

authors.name: Dong, T.
affiliations: NIHR Bristol Cardiovascular Biomedical Research Unit

authors.name: Angelini Gd
affiliations: NIHR Bristol Cardiovascular Biomedical Research Unit

abstract: Our findings demonstrated satisfactory performance for all three LLMs in the MRCS Part A examination, with GPT 4.0 the only LLM that achieved the pass mark set.
